history.proof: intros l m z Hmap. unfold cA. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment l : list m : fmap z : dart Hmap : inv_hmap m Unable to unify "(fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1 m0 k y else cA_1 m0 k z else cA_1 m0 k z end for cA) m one z" with "(fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1 m0 k y else cA_1 m0 k z else cA_1 m0 k z end for cA) (Br m l) one z".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA (Br m l) one z = cA m one z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else
Br = fix Br (m : fmap) (l : list) {struct l} : fmap := match l with | lam => m | cons x x' l0 => Br (Br1 m x x') l0 end : fmap -> list -> fmap
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive list : Set := lam : list | cons : dart -> dart -> list -> list
dart = nat : Set
exd_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (Br m l) z
inv_hmap_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (Br m l)
cA1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA (Br1 m x x') one z = cA m one z
cA1_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 (Br1 m x x') one z = cA_1 m one z
cF_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA m zero (cA m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cF_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF_1 (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec x (cA m one z) then cA m zero x' else if eq_dart_dec x' (cA m one z) then cA m zero x else cF_1 m z)
McA1.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md1.k (cA_1 m Md1.k z) = z
McA0.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md0.k (cA_1 m Md0.k z) = z
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA0_MA0 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), cA m zero z = MA0.f m z
MA0_f_cA0 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), MA0.f m z = cA m zero z
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z <> nil -> exd m z
cA_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z
cA_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cF_L1_y0_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in (j < dx - 1)%nat -> y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) (j + 1) x = x
cA_I : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> x <> z -> cA (I m x u p) k z = cA m k z
cF_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let x10 := cF_1 m x in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let m1 := L m one x y in cF m1 z = (if eq_dart_dec y0 z then x else if eq_dart_dec x10 z then y_1 else cF m z)
cF_L1_x10_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j < dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) (dx - (j + 1)) y_1 = y_1
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA m k z
cA_cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
cF_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m one x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x') z then cA_1 m one x else cF m z)
diff_cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j + 1 + i <= dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 <> x
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA0_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cA (Br1 m x x') zero z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then cA m zero x' else if eq_dart_dec x' z then cA m zero x else cA m zero z)
diff_cF_L1_y_1_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j + 1 + i <= dx - 1)%nat -> (0 < i)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 <> y_1
cF_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
cF_1_cF : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF_1 m (cF m z) = z
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
cA_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA m k1 z
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j < dx - 1)%nat -> (j + 1 + i <= dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 = Iter (cF m) (j + 1 + i) x
MF.period_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.Iter_upb m t

```
intros l m z Hmap.
unfold cA.
rewrite (exd_Br _ _ z Hmap).
reflexivity.
```

original: intros l m z Hmap. unfold cA. rewrite (exd_Br _ _ z Hmap). reflexivity.
